name: Sandstone Admin Panel
description: A clean and organized admin panel layout with a warm, neutral color palette and rounded cards.

atoms.name: Rounded Card
atoms.description: White container with rounded corners and subtle shadow.

atoms.name: Primary Button
atoms.description: Solid button with rounded corners and a subtle hover effect.
atoms.css: background-color: #2D2D2D; color: #FFFFFF; border-radius: 8px; padding: 8px 16px; font-weight: 500; cursor: pointer; border: none; transition: background-color 0.2s ease;

atoms.name: Section Heading
atoms.description: Clear and concise heading for sections.

atoms.name: Text Input
atoms.description: Simple text input field with a light border.
atoms.css: border: 1px solid #D1D5DB; border-radius: 6px; padding: 8px 12px; font-size: 14px; color: #2D2D2D;

code.css: .container { background-color: #F5F3F0; padding: 20px; display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr)); gap: 20px; } .card { background-color: #FFFFFF; border-radius: 12px; box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04); padding: 16px; }
code.tailwind: bg-gray-100 p-5 grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-5 rounded-lg

best_for: Applications requiring a clean and organized layout
User interfaces with a focus on usability
Situations where a neutral and calming aesthetic is desired
avoid_for: Marketing websites requiring a high level of visual excitement
Applications targeting a younger audience that prefers bold colors
Designs needing a strong sense of depth or realism (neo-skeuomorphism)
Projects where a dark or high-contrast theme is necessary
UIs requiring complex animations or interactions
